name: Privateers
description: Privateers is a roguelite set in a fantasy nautical world. Players are set free into an archipelago where they can become a heroic navy captain or an evil pirate overlord depending on the choices that they make.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support Storage: 1 GB available space
